content: stitch marker on first row begin chart 4 or continue with written instructions row 1 rs using b k4 sl1 wyib k2 to m sm sl1 finishing wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif weave in ends wet block and shape flat to row 2 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyib to m sm p2 sl1 measurements below wyif to the last 4 sts p4 once dry sew together the two ends a and b as row 3 rs using a k2 sl2 wyib k1 to 2 sts before indicated in diagram using your darning needle a m sl2 wyib sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif piece of matching yarn and mattress stitch row 4 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif p1 to 1 st before end p1 gridster cowl © 2022 lynnell koser page 5 yarn hero fiber arts | www yarnhero com chart 1 key chart 2 note there are only a few small changes in this section which calls for a sl2 wyif instead of a sl2 wyib these changes have been highlighted so you do not miss them e 5 g 2 d 5 n e 1 o 3 s t a b c m c a gridster cowl © 2022 lynnell koser page 6 20 51cm 23 58cm 30 76cm 2 1 5 3 8c m c 5 m 2 3 yarn hero fiber arts | www yarnhero com chart 3 chart 4 key gridster cowl © 2022 lynnell koser page 7 yarn hero fiber arts | www yarnhero com example from pattern additional info section 1 row 4 k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib p1 to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif gauge swatch we will start with the first part of the row k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m setup cast on 32 stitches in color a knit 2 slip marker slip 1 stitch yarn was already in purl across back move yarn to front purl 1 move yarn to back join color b slip 1 stitch move yarn to front purl 1 repeat to marker slip marker pattern row 1 rs using b k1 sl1 wyib k2 to 1 st before now the second part of the row end k1 sl2 wyib p1 to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif row 2 ws k1 p2 sl1 wyif to 1 st before end k1 move yarn to back slip 2 stitches one at a time move row 3 rs using a k1 k1 sl2 wyib to 1 st before yarn to front purl 1 repeat to 4 sts before marker end k1 purl 4 slip marker slip 2 stitches your yarn was row 4 ws k1 sl2 wyib p1 to 1 st before end k1 already in front repeat pattern 12 times you should end up with a square that is roughly 4 inches by 4 inches if you like the feel of your swatch begin
